ygData.subject: Greetings
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I m Mary Beth and I play a 65 Dark Elf Cleric (Brinni) and a 65 Human Monk (Naiya) on the Ayonae Ro server.  I belong to the guild Legend of the Jokers
ygData.messageBody:
Hello,

I'm Mary Beth and I play a 65 Dark Elf Cleric (Brinni) and a 65
Human Monk (Naiya) on the Ayonae Ro server. I belong to the guild
Legend of the Jokers www.lotj.net and I have just ran across this
mailing list. I would love to be a part of it and meet some new
everquest players; female ones at that!

I should also mention that I am doing a University paper on the
women of everquest. The other reason I decided to join this mail
list is to get some opinions from other women who play everquest and
what it means to them to be involved in this type of mporpg. If
anyone is interested in finding more information out about my
research paper and wouldn't mind answering a few questions, feel
free to contact me either through here or privately.

Thanks and I look forward to meeting all of you!
~Mary Beth
